Admin Settings¶

Account Settings - is a list of account properties that helps to identify and manage acсount. Data from account used for creating mailboxes and billing.

Copy Account uuid¶

  1. Navigate to https://staging.whitedoc.space/admin/account-settings

  1. Click “copy” icon”

  1. Message about successful copy should appear

Edit personal account¶

  1. Navigate to https://staging.whitedoc.space/admin/account-settings

  1. Click on the “Name” input. Validation (minimum 3 symbols, maximum 256 symbols)

  1. Edit account name.

  1. Press save changes

  1. Message about successful update should appear

Edit company account¶

  1. Navigate to https://staging.whitedoc.space/admin/account-settings

  1. Click on the “Name” input. Validation (minimum 3 symbols, maximum 255 symbols)

  1. Edit account name.

  1. Click on the “ITN” input. Validation (minimum 8 symbols, maximum 128 symbols)

  1. Edit account itn.

  1. Press save changes

  1. Message about successful update should appear

Going back¶

  1. Navigate to https://staging.whitedoc.space/admin/account-settings

  1. Click “Cancel” button. This action will take you to previous page.

Delete account¶

  1. Navigate to https://staging.whitedoc.space/admin/account-settings

  1. Click “Delete” button.

  1. Popup should open.

  1. Popup should open.

  1. If you want to cancel the operation click ‘Cancel’

  1. Type your user e-mail in uppercase to email input

  1. Click “Confirm”
